Let the professional assist you how to create signature for your Yahoo mail:-
• Open your yahoo mail account and search for mail option on the top right corner of the mail.
• Enter in to the signature category to move ahead.
• Be certain that the signature to all outgoing mails is selected.
• Enter the e-mail signature, it can be your name with phone number so that not really you have to enter your nitty-gritty, once you have created a signature it is attached to each outgoing mail.
• Click on save changes.
